body_html:
Hm, yes -f doesn't exist on the Mac OS readlink. We should probably emulate the canonicalization this way...
http://stackoverflow.com/questions/1055671/how-can-i-get-the-behavior-of-gnus-readlink-f-on-a-mac
third_party/gpus/cuda/BUILD:181

Asking the original author of that code to update it to work on Mac OS.

body:
Hm, yes -f doesn't exist on the Mac OS readlink.  We should probably emulate the canonicalization this way...
http://stackoverflow.com/questions/1055671/how-can-i-get-the-behavior-of-gnus-readlink-f-on-a-mac
